response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, not only in terms of its monetary worth but also due to its exceptional qualities and the impact it has had on my own experiences.

I am extending to you an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $1,200,000. This price reflects a strategic compromise aimed at making the product accessible to you while ensuring a fair return for my investment and efforts in acquiring it. I understand that the true value of such a product may be subjective and varies greatly depending on its intended use and the benefits it brings to you personally or professionally.

Please consider this offer carefully and let me know if you have any questions or require additional information about the product. I am more than happy to provide you with detailed specifications, testimonials, or any other details that might help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response and the possibility of working together to unlock the full potential of this remarkable product.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
